title: What happened to the Special Effect from Arcade Sona Skin?
body:
Arcade Sona is like a normal sona to me because the Special effect is gone. when you use your W mini pixel shield says up shield but its gone, the boots speed up mini pixel is gone too, the music aura special effects is gone too. WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!?........................
I'm starting to hates this !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
watch the differences and you'll know what I mean.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8UUD5mZ_f_k

replies.body:
Solid point! 

Anyone from Riot who can shed some light on this?

Thanks for supporting me :D
you main support too <3
